column5: I recently booked a fly in to LOW in early June. We will be on the Ontario side. Does anybody know the policy on live bait in this area? What can we bring across the border? Any other tips would be appreciated, this being our first time to LOW. Thanks.
Last I knew you could only take worms accross and then only in commercial bedding.Keep your rod bent!!GrandPops :-)
No live leeches or minnows. Crawlers in paper bedding can be imported. Leeches are available by the pound at a comparable US price in most bait shops.
